document_data.name: Roderick Tem
document_data.mainbody: '''Roderick Tem''' was a male [[human]] leader of the [[Fire Knives]] during the [[Time of Troubles]].
document_data.History: Roderick was the leader of the Fire Knives during the Time of Troubles in [[1358]]. Roderick and his men had just occupied [[Dembling Castle]] when the god [[Bane]] called to him the souls of all [[assassin]]s and Roderick and his men all died instantly.
